title: Geometric View of Soft Decorrelation in Self-Supervised Learning
details: Y Zhang, H Zhu, Z Song, Y Chen, X Fu, Z Meng… - Proceedings of the 30th …, 2024
abstract: Contrastive learning, a form of Self-Supervised Learning (SSL), typically consists of an alignment term and a regularization term. The alignment term minimizes the distance between the embeddings of a positive pair, while the regularization term …
